backend/main.mo: Main actor defining the jewelry e-commerce backend with product catalog (categories: ring/headpiece/bracelet/diamond; materials: 22K/18K/9K gold), order management, cart functionality, customer profiles, business contact info, logo management, analytics tracking (visits/downloads), and access control integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms product data from old format (material as Text) to new format (material as explicit Material enum: 22K/18K/9K gold) while preserving all other actor state including customers, orders, carts, analytics, and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of four main features: three gold product categories (22K/18K/9K), running banner for lab-grown diamonds, enhanced admin panel with full product/inventory/order/carousel management, and Google Pay UPI integration for checkout.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend React components and pages, emphasizing consistent metallic gold styling throughout the UI, real-time order polling, admin functionality, profile setup, analytics tracking, and proper enum handling for product categories and materials.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using HSL values for background, foreground, primary, secondary, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with meta tags, favicon reference, and title 'Aurelie Gold & Diamonds - Online Jewellery Store'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, page navigation, profile setup modal, admin status checking, visit/PWA install tracking, and rendering appropriate pages (home, products, cart, checkout, orders, admin) with Header, RunningBanner, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddProduct: Admin modal for adding new products with form fields for name, description, price, category, material, stock, and up to 5 images with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Displays analytics dashboard with visit and download counts, and provides CSV export functionality for visits, PWA installs, and summary metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/BusinessIn: Modal component for editing business contact information and uploading/updating the business logo with file validation and preview functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/CarouselMa: Admin interface for managing carousel items with add, edit, delete operations and image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditProduc: Modal for editing existing products with support for updating details, managing up to 5 images (existing and new), and form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/InventoryM: Inventory management interface with product search and bulk stock level updates across multiple products.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Admin component for managing orders with real-time polling, status updates, and visual notifications for new orders. Displays order details including customer info, products, and allows status changes with auto-refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Admin component for managing products with search, filtering, and editing capabilities. Displays product cards with images, categories, materials, stock status, and pricing information.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying store branding with dynamic logo, contact information (email, phone, address), quick links, and description fetched from backend queries.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, authentication controls, cart badge, admin panel access, and dynamic logo that updates the favicon; handles mobile menu and user profile display.
frontend/src/components/HomeCarousel.tsx: Auto-rotating carousel component that displays promotional images from backend with navigation controls, pagination dots, and click-through URLs.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for new users to create their profile with name, email, phone, and address; detects and displays special admin status for dedicated admin email.
frontend/src/components/RunningBanner.ts: Animated scrolling banner displaying repeating "Lab Grown Diamonds" text with sparkle icons across the top of the page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation, admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Analytics hooks for tracking page visits and PWA installations. Collects browser info, device type, platform, location (timezone), and session data for analytics purposes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication. Manages login state, identity persistence, and provides authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, products, cart, orders, admin functions, contact info, logos, and analytics. Handles data fetching, mutations, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom dark maroon and metallic gold color scheme using OKLCH color space, plus utility classes for shimmer effects, gold glow shadows, pulse animations, and banner scrolling animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying statistics (products, orders, revenue, visits), with tabs for managing products, orders, inventory, carousel, business info, and analytics sections.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page that displays cart items with product details, allows removing items, calculates total price, and provides navigation to checkout or back to products; requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page that displays order summary, supports UPI and direct order placement payment methods, shows order confirmation on success, and handles empty cart scenarios.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, carousel, feature cards (certified quality, free shipping, lifetime warranty), and featured products grid with navigation to product details.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays customer order history with status badges, filtering, sorting, and cancel order functionality. Shows order details including products, quantities, prices, and timestamps with real-time refresh capability.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product view with image gallery, category/material labels, stock status, quantity selector, and add-to-cart functionality. Includes authentication checks and navigation back to products list.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product catalog page with search, category/material filters, and price sorting. Displays product grid with images, names, prices, and stock status using memoized filtering logic.
frontend/src/types/navigation.ts: TypeScript type definition for application navigation pages including home, products, product-detail, cart, checkout, orders, and admin.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color palette (dark-maroon, gold, beige), animations (shimmer, pulse-gold), and design tokens for the jewelry e-commerce theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features including 22K/18K/9K gold categories, Lab Grown Diamonds banner, admin panel, Google Pay UPI integration, and homepage carousel with admin management.
